semantic_identifier: [GOLD-56]: Detect and redact PII in raw customer signal views and exports
title: Detect and redact PII in raw customer signal views and exports

sections.text: Implement a PII classification/redaction layer for ingested customer signals so sensitive fields (e.g., emails, phone numbers, addresses, free-text notes) are masked by default in UI raw-record views and export/download payloads. Allow workspace admins to explicitly permit unredacted access per role with a clear “view sensitive data” permission, and ensure the redaction behavior is consistently applied across API responses used by the UI and export endpoints. Add unit/integration coverage for common PII patterns and verify no regressions in fit-score/positioning pipelines that rely on non-PII features.
